node.html:
• Architected and shipped SONAR, a live diagnostics platform for 1,000+ concurrent A/V streams, completing the prototype-to-production cycle in two weeks.
  • Led ML deployments to Android devices, triaging memory issues in C++ components and orchestrating end-to-end inference workflows across services.
  • Built an image labeling pipeline with six ML models plus a React tool, accelerating labeling throughput to 150k images per day for 45+ operators.

• Designed algorithms to analyze Single Nucleus ATAC-Seq data for anomaly detection in cancer cells, helping uncover actionable treatment insights.
  • Deployed containerized workflows with Docker to process multiple snATAC sequences in parallel and compare outputs programmatically.
  • Synthesized cross-run insights to highlight significant cell-behavior interactions for the research team.

• Co-founded a DAO platform and architected backend services with 100+ APIs on AWS Lambda to scale to 25k MAU and $100k revenue.
  • Built a React-based drag-and-drop contract builder that dramatically simplified onboarding and boosted adoption.
  • Led cloud architecture decisions across Golang, Python, and DynamoDB systems to keep latency low while remaining cost efficient.

• Owned backend development for the Rize service, building 100+ REST APIs and scaling throughput to 10k+ daily requests for 3,000+ entrepreneurs.
  • Partnered with customers and PMs to fold user feedback into architecture decisions, directly influencing the product roadmap.
  • Managed CI/CD pipelines across five microservices (GitHub + Spinnaker), enabling automated tests and rapid deployments.

• Applied computer-vision techniques to build a PyTorch DNN that detects 100+ traffic signs from satellite imagery.
  • Engineered an automated ML pipeline that cut map update time by 95% while increasing accuracy for millions of drivers.
  • Deployed models on AWS + Kubernetes to deliver reliable updates across 50+ cities.
